TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MatchAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MatchAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MatchAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示使用文本模式匹配进行的匹配的特性。

span.span: Represents the attributes of a match made using text pattern matching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本模式匹配允许 XML Web 服务来利用现有的 HTML 内容通过分析它使用正则表达式。Text pattern matching allows an XML Web service to leverage existing HTML content by parsing it using regular expressions. XML Web 服务指定它想要分析在服务说明中使用匹配元素的内容。an XML Web service specifies the content it wants to parse in a Service Description using match elements. 这些匹配的元素指定多个项： 分析现有的 HTML 内容页、 是否分析必须是不区分大小写，且应返回多少个实例的内容与正则表达式匹配的正则表达式。These match elements specify several items: the regular expression for parsing the contents of an existing HTML page, whether the parsing must be case-insensitive, and how many instances of content that matches the regular expression should be returned. 代理类的方法时客户端生成代理类使用 Wsdl.exe 工具，包括详细说明的匹配元素在服务描述中找到。When a client builds a proxy class using the Wsdl.exe tool, methods of the proxy class include a detailing the match elements found in the Service Description. 文本模式匹配的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a3be8ac-c770-43fa-8525-e318a1c9f0bf)。For more information on text pattern matching, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a3be8ac-c770-43fa-8525-e318a1c9f0bf). ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的模式初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类使用指定的模式。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified pattern. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |模式Pattern|`pattern` 参数的值。The value of the `pattern` parameter.| ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定匹配项所属的组。Use the property to specify a group that a match belongs to. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要从匹配返回的值的最大数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of values to return from the match.

value.span: 要从匹配返回的值的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of values to return from the match.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指代返回所有值。

span.span: The default value is -1, which refers to returning all values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值为 1，则仅返回第一个匹配项。A value of 1 returns only the first match. 如果值为 -1，则返回所有匹配项。A value of -1 returns all matches. 此外，值为-1 等同于 \* 正则表达式中。Additionally, a value of -1 equates to an '\*' in a regular expression. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定表示要匹配的值的正则表达式。Use the property to specify a regular expression that represents the value to match. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#4)]
